import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:5000/api";export function setAuthToken(token){if(token)axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"]="Bearer ".concat(token);else delete axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"];}export async function signup(username,password){return(await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/signup"),{username,password})).data;}export async function login(username,password){return(await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),{username,password})).data;}export async function fetchMe(){return(await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/me"))).data;}export async function fetchIPOs(){// Use a fresh axios instance with NO auth header
return(await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/ipos"),{headers:{Authorization:undefined}})).data;}export async function fetchIPOByName(name){return(await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/ipo/").concat(encodeURIComponent(name)))).data;}export async function calcProfitLoss(ipo_name,qty,sell_price){return(await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/profitloss"),{ipo_name,qty,sell_price})).data;}export async function mlPredict(features){return(await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/ml_predict"),features)).data;}export async function fetchIPOTrends(){return(await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/ipo_trends"))).data;}export async function getSentiment(ipo_name){return(await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/ipo_sentiment"),{ipo_name})).data;}
